Tucson continues to watch Drill Bit carefully.  He also knew that his drago=
n mode was a little bit more suited for dealing with strangers since it was=
 easy to ward them off as a large predator.   He makes the transformation a=
s silently as possible and then remains hidden, but with a little bit of a =
rumbling growl to his voice.  It would be just enough to make himself heard=
 and determined as an apex predator who is not to be toiled with.
